subject: Super Bowl
Football
lead_paragraph: Lombardi, Namath, Bradshaw, Montana and Elway. Each famous and familiar name put his imprint on a Super Bowl in Miami, where XLI will engrave another name into pro football history.
snippet: Lombardi, Namath, Bradshaw, Montana and Elway. Each famous and familiar name put his imprint on a Super Bowl in Miami, where XLI will engrave another name into pro football history.
